title: 5 Easy Ways to Unblock Contacts on iPhone or iPad

steps.title: Open the Settings app.
steps.content: Open the Settings app. This is the grey cog icon. [1] X Research source Be sure to update your iPhone . You can use this method to easily see all the blocked numbers on your iPhone .

steps.title: Tap Apps.
steps.content: Tap Apps . If you're using iOS 17 or older, skip this step.

steps.title: Tap Phone.
steps.content: Tap Phone . You can find this in the list of apps.

steps.title: Tap Blocked Contacts.
steps.content: Tap Blocked Contacts . You may need to scroll down to find this option. You'll see a list of your current blocked numbers.

steps.title: Tap Edit.
steps.content: Tap Edit . This will be in the top-right corner. A red circle with a line in the center will appear to the left of the blocked numbers.

steps.title: Tap the red circle next to the number you want to unblock.
steps.content: Tap the red circle next to the number you want to unblock. A red Unblock button will appear on the right side of the number.

steps.title: Tap Unblock.
steps.content: Tap Unblock . The number will be unblocked. You can now receive messages and phone calls from the number.

steps.title: Open the Phone app.
steps.content: Open the Phone app. This is the app used to make calls on your iPhone .

steps.title: Tap Recents.
steps.content: Tap Recents . This will be on the bottom of the screen, between Favorites and Contacts . [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap i next to the number you want to unblock.
steps.content: Tap i next to the number you want to unblock. You may need to scroll through your Recents to find it. A new window will open with the contact details.

steps.title: Tap Unblock Caller.
steps.content: Tap Unblock Caller . This will be in blue text on the very bottom. The number will be unblocked. You can now receive messages and phone calls from the number. On the other hand, you can also find out if you are blocked .

steps.title: Open the Messages app.
steps.content: Open the Messages app. This is the app used to send messages on your iPhone.

steps.title: Tap a conversation with the person you want to unblock.
steps.content: Tap a conversation with the person you want to unblock. You can scroll up and down to find the contact, or you can swipe down on your screen to use the search bar.

steps.title: Tap the person's contact photo.
steps.content: Tap the person's contact photo. If they don't have an associated photo, you'll see a grey person icon.

steps.title: Tap info.
steps.content: Tap info . This will be below the number, underneath a person icon.

steps.title: Tap Unblock this Caller.
steps.content: Tap Unblock this Caller . This will be in blue text on the very bottom. The number will be unblocked. You can now receive messages and phone calls from the number.

steps.title: Open the FaceTime app.
steps.content: Open the FaceTime app. This is the app used to make FaceTime calls on your iPhone. By default, you'll see a list of recent FaceTime calls.

steps.title: Tap i next to the number you want to unblock.
steps.content: Tap i next to the number you want to unblock. You may need to scroll through your Recents to find it. A new window will open with the contact details.

steps.title: Tap Unblock Caller.
steps.content: Tap Unblock Caller . This will be in blue text on the very bottom. The number will be unblocked. You can now receive messages and phone calls from the number.

steps.title: You can unblock any number that has been previously blocked.
steps.content: You can unblock any number that has been previously blocked. This applies to numbers you have saved in your Contacts app and those not saved. If you don't have the number saved to your contacts, the easiest way to unblock the number is to use the Settings app , since all blocked numbers will appear in a list. You must know the number to know which one to correctly unblock. If you're unsure and the number contacted you recently, you can narrow down the options by using the Recent tab in the Phone or Messages app instead.
